search_results.title: Rosemary Collard - CCPA
search_results.snippet: Rosemary Collard is a human geographer and political ecologist whose research aims to develop political economic explanations for defaunation and extinction.

search_results.title: Rosemary Collard
search_results.snippet: Rosemary Collard co-directs the Extinction Paradox research program and is an associate professor in geography at Simon Fraser University.
